title: Problem Solve
content:
🧩 P [ ] Problem Solve Report
*Enter the floor number in the first “[ ]”. For each subsequent “[ ]”, enter a quantity and specify “totes” or “U-boats”.*

1. Problem Solve: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → problem-solve DZ

2. Damaged / Unscannable Items: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → dz-P-DAMAGELAND; move U-boats to Damageland

3. Shoes: [ ] *(Only if shoe stow isn’t available on your current floor)*  
↳ IDRT → dz-P-1A266 / dz-P-1B266 / dz-P-1C266 / dz-P-1D266  
↳ Move U-boats to chosen DZ

4. Library Non-Con: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → dz-S-Cubiscan; move U-boats to ISS

5. Large Apparel Non-Con: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → IB Dock; move U-boats to Decant

6. ISS or Hazmat: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → dz-P-ISS; move U-boats to ISS

7. Jewelry or HRV: [ ]  
↳ IDRT → dz-P-2N327 / dz-P-2M327 / dz-P-2N364 / dz-P-2M364  
↳ Move U-boats to chosen DZ
